hero.subtitle: 11th-grader by day, aspiring developer by night. Started with Minecraft redstone, ended up writing Python. No regrets. ????

about.title: About Me
paragraphs: I'm a Science stream student at PM SHRI KV 210 CoBRA CRPF Dalgaon, studying PCMCs - Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics & Computer Science.

What started as curiosity about Minecraft redstone circuits slowly transformed into a genuine love for programming. Today I build real apps, experiment with Python, and vibe-code my way through side projects. ??
I'm a hackathon veteran (team leader, no less!) and an aspiring developer who believes the best way to learn is to just build stuff - even if it breaks first.

facts.label: School
facts.value: PM SHRI KV 210 CoBRA CRPF Dalgaon

items.title: ğŸ® Minecraft Led Me Here
items.desc: Got my first laptop. Was obsessed with Minecraft redstone - complex circuits, logic gates, contraptions. Somehow that wired my brain for programming. Started tinkering with HTML, made some practice projects (that I later deleted ??).

items.title: ğŸ¤– Built a JARVIS - Without Knowing Python
items.desc: Decided to build a Jarvis-like desktop assistant using Python. Problem: I literally knew 0% Python. Solution: copy code from YouTube tutorials. Result: it somehow worked - and I accidentally learned Python syntax along the way. Then continued with CSS.

items.title: ğŸ“ Board Exams Hit Different
items.desc: Started a proper Python course - but life had other plans. 10th board exams took over. Coding went on the back burner. The grind was real.

items.title: ğŸ Python, Completed. Streamlit, Unlocked.
items.desc: Picked up Python again - this time, finished it properly. Then discovered Streamlit and realized I could build real web apps with pure Python. Things clicked. The momentum was back.

items.title: ğŸ† Hackathon: School ? Zonal Level
items.desc: Led my team in an All-India school-level hackathon. We cleared the school round and made it to Zonal level - finishing in the top 120 nationwide. That moment hit different. This is real.

items.title: ğŸ“… DayMark Goes Live
items.desc: Developed and deployed DayMark - a real, live productivity web app. My first proper full-stack project shipped to the world. Still running at daymark.streamlit.app.

nowPlaying.note: ?? Gaming + music = the ultimate coding setup. Ask me what I'm listening to!

items.title: DayMark
items.desc: A personal productivity web app built entirely with Python & Streamlit. Track your days, mark milestones, and stay organised - all in a clean, minimal interface. Live and running!

items.title: SOON
items.desc: The project that started it all. A voice-controlled desktop assistant inspired by Iron Man - built when I knew 0% Python, by copying YouTube code and reverse-engineering it into understanding.

items.title: SOON
items.desc: Scripts and mini-projects exploring PCMCs concepts - visualizations, problem solvers, and anything that makes studying less boring and more interactive.

contact.title: Get in Touch
